The Entrepreneurship Cell of UVCE, commonly known as E-Cell UVCE, has been established with the objective of creating, fostering and promoting the spirit of entrepreneurship among the students of UVCE.

 It wants not only to ignite the minds but also to nurture the ideas of one of the most talented students of India.

 E-CELL UVCE is committed to build a strong platform for the budding entrepreneurs.

 The vision is to guide the students to take entrepreneurship as a career, as a path to success, as a journey of wisdom.
